EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the HBR Consulting on Vendor Firm Management Webinar, happening on Wednesday, July 13th at 9am PST.
Once your registration is confirmed, you will be receiving an email with information on how to access the event.
